name: Novice Mastery Slate
description: Struck to recognize your achievement in reaching the rank of 4 - Novice.

languages.description: Geschaffen, um dein Erreichen von Rang 4 - Novize zu ehren.
languages.name: Meisterschaft-Insignie: Novize

languages.description: Gravée pour commémorer votre réussite en atteignant le Palier 4 - Novice.
languages.name: Ardoise de Maîtrise - Novice

languages.description: Coniata per riconoscere il tuo successo nel raggiungere il grado 4 - Novizio.
languages.name: Targa Maestria - Novizio

languages.description: 랭크 4 - 노비스에 도달한 업적을 기리기 위한 표창패입니다.
languages.name: 노비스 마스터리 슬레이트

languages.description: Impresionado por reconocer tu logro al alcanzar el rango de 4 - Novato.
languages.name: Placa de Maestría de Novato

languages.description: 为表彰你成功达到段位 4－信徒所打造的物品。
languages.name: 信徒精通石板

languages.description: ノービスランク「マスタリーランク4」へ到達したテンノの成果を示す表彰楯。
languages.name: ノービス マスタリー 表彰楯

languages.description: Stworzona, by upamiętnić Twój wyczyn w osiągnięciu rangi 4 - Nowicjusz.
languages.name: Tablica Mistrzostwa Nowicjusz

languages.description: Concedida em reconhecimento à sua conquista por alcançar o nível 4 - Aprendiz.
languages.name: Ardósia de Maestria: Aprendiz

languages.description: 篆刻來認可你達成精通段位 4－信徒的成就。
languages.name: 信徒精段匾

languages.description: ประทับตรารับรู้ถึงความสำเร็จของคุณในการไปถึงอันดับ 4 - มือสมัครเล่น
languages.name: กระดานชนวนความเชี่ยวชาญ: มือสมัครเล่น

languages.description: Seviye 4 - Novice seviyesine ulaşma başarını anmak için oluşturulmuştur.
languages.name: Novice Ustalık Plaketi
